email.subject: [CfP] Extended deadline for JOWO paper submissions

main_message.call_to_action: The submission deadline of all JOWO workshops has been extended to June 14th, 2025.
main_message.motivational_message: Don’t hesitate, even a small idea can have huge impact.

historical_reference.example: A twenty page document titled “Information Management: A proposal”
historical_reference.outcome: ended being the birth certificate of the internet, signed by one Sir Tim Berners-Lee.

main_message.community_invitation: we welcome your work within the communities of Joint Ontologies Workshops (JOWO).

workshops: 14th International Workshop on Formal Ontologies Meet Industry (FOMI)
Fifth International Workshop on Semantic Web and Ontology Design for Cultural Heritage (SWODCH 2025)
Knowledge Management and process mining for Law (KM4LAW)
The 2nd International Workshop on Modeling for Cybersecurity (Shields 2)
Second Annual Workshop on Convergence of Large-Language Models and Ontologies (ONTOLLM 2025)
Workshop on Promoting Healthy Aging through the Semantic Enrichment of Social Science (PHASES 2025)
Perspectival Ontology Workshop on Entities that can be Realized (POWERs)

co_hosting.event: 15th International Conference on Formal Ontology in Information Systems (FOIS)

footer.contribution_notice: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask]
